Package org.fluidity.composition

Dependency injection container interface and supporting artifacts.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Component.Reference
    Qualifier annotation that captures the parameterized type of a component reference.
    ComponentContainer
    The external API of a fully populated dependency injection container.
    ComponentContainer.Bindings
    Embodies a list of mappings from component class to component interface and / or component group.
    ComponentContainer.Observer
    Observes component dependency resolutions.
    ComponentContainer.Registry
    Allows adding component bindings to a dependency injection container.
    ComponentContext
    The run-time context for a component instance.
    ComponentDiscovery
    Partially implements the service provider discovery mechanism described in the JAR File Specification.
    ContainerServicesFactory
    An internal component not intended for any sort of interaction with application or service provider logic.
    DependencyPath
    A dependency path used when observing dependency resolutions.
    DependencyPath.Element
    Details about one element in a dependency path.
    MutableContainer
    A dependency injection container that components can be added to, using the container's registry.
    ObservedContainer
    A dependency injection container that exposes to application components the static dependencies in a dependency graph without instantiating components, and the dynamic dependencies while resolving and instantiating components.
    OpenContainer
    The external API of a fully populated dependency injection container that that allows dynamic component lookup.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoundaryComponent
    An abstract class to extend by components at the edge of the application to enjoy field based dependency injection.
    ComponentContainer.ObserverSupport
    Implements the ComponentContainer.Observer interface with empty methods.
    Components
    This utility is used to determine the component interfaces and group interfaces a class should be bound to when it is bound to a dependency injection container.
    Components.Interfaces
    List of component interfaces and corresponding component group interfaces for a component class.
    Components.Specification
    A component interface and the associated component group interfaces.
    ContainerBoundary
    External access to a class loader specific dependency injection container.
    Containers
    Static access to component containers.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Qualifier.Composition
    Defines how a chain of occurrences of the same qualifiers along an instantiation path is handled.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ComponentContainer.BindingException
    Reports an error that occurred when binding a component class or instance to its component interfaces.
    ComponentContainer.CircularReferencesException
    Reports that some chain of dependencies is circular.
    ComponentContainer.InjectionException
    Top level exception for errors related to the dependency injection.
    ComponentContainer.InstantiationException
    Reports an error that occurred while trying to instantiate a component during dependency resolution.
    ComponentContainer.ResolutionException
    Reports an error that occurred when resolving a component reference to a component.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Component
    Specifies the component interface(s) that a class implements, which should resolve to the annotated class at run time by a dependency injection container.
    Component.Qualifiers
    Lists the context qualifiers accepted by the annotated component class.
    ComponentGroup
    This annotation marks interfaces or classes that are expected to have several implementations that are used together as a group by some component.
    Defer
    Marks a dependency for lazy instantiation.
    Inject
    This annotation is used to mark instance fields and/or constructors of a component for dependency injection.
    Optional
    Annotates a component reference as optional dependency.
    Qualifier
    Applied to an annotation type, the Qualifier.value() parameter determines how multiple instances of the qualifier are handled.
    ServiceProvider
    Declares that the annotated class, or implementing classes of the annotated interface, are service providers in the JAR File Specification's meaning of the term.

Package org.fluidity.composition Description

Dependency injection container interface and supporting artifacts.

In the order of expected frequency of use, this package contains the followings:

  • annotations to designate
    • dependency injected and injectable components
    • dependency injected and injectable groups of components
    • context qualifiers for dependency injected components
    • dependency injectable constructors and fields
    • optional dependencies
    • lazily instantiated dependencies
    • JAR file service providers
  • interfaces to
    • access a dependency injection container internally
    • access a dependency injection container externally
  • â€¦ and various exceptions and utilities
